column6: The executive head of the Forestry Commission in England.  Reports to Defra Ministers and is responsible for providing strategic leadership and for overseeing all aspects of the department's operations.
column7: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

column6: The executive head of Forest Enterprise England. Reports to Director England and is responsible for providing strategic leadership and for overseeing all aspects of the department's operations in Forest Enterprise England.
column7: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

column6: Lead on the preparation of policy and strategic programmes in FC England.
column7: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

column6: Manage the FC’s Central Services, including shared services, GB cross-border and Forest Research.
column7: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

column6: Act as the Forestry Commission’s Finance Director in support of Director Central Services.  Manage the Finance & Accounting shared service, supporting managers across the FC and its Agencies. Lead on preparation and implementation of efficiency plans. Act as SIRO for the FC.
column7: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

column6: Manage the Corporate & Forestry Support Division in delivering the GB functions of the FC - forest sustainability standards; forests and climate change; biosecurity; authoritative information and evidence; governance. Deliver FC’s corporate support functions: Inventory, Forecasting and Operational Support; Communications; Business Sustainability. Secretary to the Board of Forestry Commissioners.
column7: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

column6: Manage the Information Services shared service, supporting managers across the FC and its Agencies.
column7: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

column6: The Chief Executive of Forest Research, the Executive Agency which undertakes scientific research into all aspects of forestry.
column7: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs

column6: The FC's Chief Scientist, responsible for directing all scientific research undertaken by the Agency.
column7: Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs
